content.text:
# 7th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus

This is a list of members of parliament (MPs) elected to the Assembly of the Republic for the 7th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus at the 2009 parliamentary election.
The list below indicates the MPs in the parties in which they were elected; any change of political party is indicated separately.
{| class=wikitable style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:0px; font-size:90%;"
|-
! colspan="2"|Party
! Members
! Change
! Proportion
|-
| style="background: #FF7F00" | || National Unity Party || 26 || 12 || 52%
|-
| style="background: #008000" | || Republican Turkish Party || 15 || 9  || 30%
|-
| style="background: #DC241f" | || Democratic Party || 5 || 1 || 10%
|-
| style="background: #0000FF" | || Communal Democracy Party || 2 || new party || 4%
|-
| style="background: #00BFFF" | || Freedom and Reform Party || 2 || new party || 4%
|-
| colspan="2" | Total || 50 || || 100%
|-
